home.intro: I am an independent game developer and 3D modeler. I enjoy developing creative projects and learning new technologies.

games.title: My Games
games.description: I'm working on my game projects. They will be here very soon!
games.updateText: Follow me for updates on upcoming projects

models.title: My 3D Models
models.intro: My passion for making games has led me to make my own models. I am learning how to make in-game models with Blender. Soon this page will include models and projects I have made !
models.description: I'm working on my 3D modeling projects. They will be here very soon!
models.quote: The best ideas need to be shared.
models.contact: I'm always here for your questions!

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: You can contact me for new projects, collaborations or any questions. I will try to respond to your messages as soon as possible.
contact.quote: The best ideas need to be shared.
contact.available: I'm always here for your questions!
